about_the_game:
Seraph Circle Monster Pack 3 is finally here! Featuring all new amazing illustrations by Jo Seraph, this pack includes incredible and unique monsters you wont find anywhere else. Apsatfelt, Singubean, Slugsoul, Godhand, Anjumin, Skullblade... these are just a few of the menacing and intimidating monsters you will find in this comprehensive new pack!

Features:

* 133 Front View Monsters
* 133 Side View Monsters
* 22 Faces
* for use in RPG Maker MZ or the engine of your choice
